page.title: 04St Annes - Impressions
page.content: St Annes is a small commercial town with many shops and activities providing an ideal holiday resort for families and the elderly.The shops range from those really well-known to family shops.Activities include golf courses,open-air pool,pier and Fair- haven lake for sailing,walking,tennis, windsurfing. The beach extends to Blackpool.These are what keep St Annes alive.Nearby is Ashton Gardens.The main road stretches from Blackpool through to Preston.On this route are many churches and two private schools;Queen Mary for girls and King Edward for boys.Nearby is Lytham St Annes High School,a comprehensive for boys and girls.Many modern well- equipped hotels with pools and squash courts line the front.
